post.text: #ICYMI: Today I delivered my Foreign Policy speech at Youngstown State University. TOGETHER, WE will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN!

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: Mr.Trump, I was disappointed with the massive audience of Olympic coverage, that you didn't run several Trump ads. It is vital that you stay focused on critical issues like improving employment, lowering the corporate tax rate & streamlining the burdensome regulations, national security & rebuilding our military strength. Please don't be distracted with liberal name-calling & efforts to confuse the low information voter. Thanks, Eric

replies.author: Natalie
replies.text: LOL...Trump IS the low information voter.

replies.author: Liza
replies.text: Thousands of yoibgive trump advice, he doesn't listen to you or anyone. Get smart to dem

replies.author: Liza
replies.text: Stop voting for those rich liars that use you at the ballot box every 4 years
